result.reason: When NoCredentials is selected, the tab still displays inherited/default username instead of showing blank credentials, misleading users about which account is being used for the connection.
result.approach: When credential record is NoCredentials, ensure the tab UI displays empty/blank credential info rather than falling through to inherited or default values. Fix the credential resolution logic to properly return empty strings for username/domain when NoCredentials is the active credential type.
